name: Bowing Bird
languages: understands simple words in Common, but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The bird has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Natural Decorum
traits.desc: Creatures of Small size or larger that the bird can see that move to within 5 feet of the bird without first bowing to it (or performing some analogous gesture, if unable to bow) provoke an attack of opportunity from the bird.

actions.name: Bill
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
